Where you playing Gladiator or Openglad?

If Openglad, have you successfully brought back slimes before with a
cleric?

--- In gladiator@yahoogroups.com, "alternate_dph" <dph_of_rules@u...>
wrote:
> I was playing Telvido's scenario #390 with an super-charged cleric and
> the only character types I could bring back as either skeletons or
> ghosts were the faeries placed in the scenario - not the slimes. 
> Anybody have any idea on why not?
> 
> Oh yea, my cleric was boosted up using my "Trickster's Boost".
